statements: DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 102;
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' AND maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 123 AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date <= '2022-01-01' OR equipment_name LIKE '%compressor%';

DELETE FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair' AND equipment_id IN (SELECT id FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE scheduled_maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC);

DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
